data.name: Sample - Google Cloud Storage - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Google Cloud Storage" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Bucket's List Policy
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of access control entries associated with a bucket from Google Cloud Storage based on the bucket name you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Get Bucket's List Policy

workflows.name: Create Bucket Policy
workflows.description: Creates a access control entry on the specified bucket on your configured Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Create Bucket Policy

workflows.name: Get Buckets List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of buckets associated with a project from Google Cloud Storage based on the project and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Get Buckets List

workflows.name: Delete Bucket
workflows.description: Deletes the specified bucket in Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name and other input parameter you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Bucket Policy Object Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific access control entry for the specified entity associated with a object from Google Cloud Storage based on the bucket name, object name, entity and other input parameter you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Get Bucket Policy Object Details

routes.name: Start -> Get Bucket Policy Object Details

workflows.name: Delete Bucket Policy
workflows.description: Deletes the access control entry for specific bucket in Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name and entity you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Delete Bucket Policy

workflows.name: Get Bucket Policy Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific access control entry for the specified entity associated with a bucket from Google Cloud Storage based on the bucket name and entity you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Get Bucket Policy Details

workflows.name: Get Bucket Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific bucket information from Google Cloud Storage based on the bucket name and other input parameter you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Get Bucket Details

workflows.name: Get Bucket's List Object Policy
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of access control entries associated with a object from Google Cloud Storage based on the bucket name, object name and other input parameter you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Get Bucket's List Object Policy

routes.name: Start -> Get Buckets List Object Policy

workflows.name: Delete Bucket Object Policy
workflows.description: Deletes the access control entry for specific bucket in Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name and entity you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Delete Bucket Object Policy

workflows.name: Update Bucket Object Policy
workflows.description: Updates a access control entry on specified object on your configured Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name, object name, entity and other input parameter you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Update Bucket Object Policy

workflows.name: Create Bucket Object Policy
workflows.description: Creates a access control entry on the specified object for specific bucket on your configured Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name, object name and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Create Bucket Object Policy

workflows.name: Update Bucket Policy
workflows.description: Updates a access control entry on specified bucket on your configured Google Cloud Storage server based on the bucket name and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Google Cloud Storage: Update Bucket Policy

workflows.name: Create Bucket
workflows.description: Creates a bucket on your configured Google Cloud Storage server based on the project and other input parameters you have specified.
